actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Telecommunications, Consumer Protection and Finance

official_title: A joint resolution to prohibit the Federal Communications Commission from permitting long distance carriers to bypass local telephone exchanges.

summary.text: Prohibits the Federal Communications Commission from taking any action between October 1, 1985, and September 30, 1987, that permits any provider of long distance telephone services to bypass local telephone exchanges.

titles.title: A joint resolution to prohibit the Federal Communications Commission from permitting long distance carriers to bypass local telephone exchanges.
